attributes.action: ban ritual slaughter in Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ritual slaughter, the inhumane method of killing animals as practiced by muslims and Jews, is barbaric and is against the laws of this country.  We call on the government to end the dispensation that allows religious groups to practice animal sacrifice in this country.  Especially hoisting and the jewish method of shequita.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
